alert.note: Alert for Leon; Limestone; Robertson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 5:02PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Robertson, west central Leon and southeastern Limestone Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 501 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a pair of strong thunderstorms, one near Lake Limestone, and the other 8 miles north of Twin Oak Reservoir. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If on or near Lake Limestone or Twin Oak Reservoir, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
